title: I got a new pixel 3xl i got a case with it and now i found out one scratch and i can't get rid of ?
content:
I got a small scratch on my back of the phone.
I don't know where it came from the cover was always on.
I try with soap,water, toothpaste,etc... Still it is there not deep scratch or dank.
Help me to get rid of it please.
ps. It's on the glossy back.
Thanks
